sentences.en: An advanced onboard micro-computer ensures the exoskeleton moves in concert with the operator.
sentences.cn: 一种最先进的机载微型电脑确保了外骨骼与操作器一致移动。

sentences.en: For example, scientists at Raytheon (RTN) have been working on an exoskeleton to give its user super strength like that of the Hulk.
sentences.cn: 举个例子来说吧，雷声公司的研究人员开发一件外骨骼，可以使用户拥有绿巨人一样的强大力量。

sentences.en: He plans to add regenerative capabilities to the exoskeleton, so that it will require little or no power when moving on level ground.
sentences.cn: 他计划要为外骨骼添加再生能源的能力，使得平地的运行能耗损很少能源或甚至不耗损能源。

sentences.en: He was wearing an elaborate exoskeleton suit that enabled him to, remarkably, tap a soccer ball with his foot using only his mind—no buttons, no muscles, just brainwaves.
sentences.cn: 凭借身上穿戴的一套“外骨骼装置”，他仅靠自己的意念就完成了开球动作——没错，既不靠按钮，也不靠肌肉，而是靠脑电波。

sentences.en: Hu 〕 by a call of the coelenterate coral exoskeleton made together.
sentences.cn: ◎〔～瑚〕由一种叫珊瑚虫的腔肠动物的外骨骼聚集而成.

sentences.en: The exoskeleton of insects is largely made of protein and chitin.
sentences.cn: 昆虫的外骨骼大部分是由蛋白质和几丁质组成的。

sentences.en: The exoskeleton structure of female pleopod in Macrobrachium rosenbergii was primarily investigated by histological method.
sentences.cn: 用组织学方法初步研究了罗氏沼虾雌体腹肢外骨骼的结构。

sentences.en: The outermost layer of cuticle of an arthropod exoskeleton, composed mostly of wax.
sentences.cn: 主要为水生的节肢动物,通常身体分节并有壳质的外骨骼.

sentences.en: Their hard outer shell, called the exoskeleton, does not grow with crawfish and is shed periodically.
sentences.cn: 它们坚硬的外壳, 叫做外骨骼, 不会随着小龙虾的成长而生长,而会周期性蜕落.

sentences.en: These formed the innards underneath the exoskeleton provided to the animators.
sentences.cn: 这些将与外观一同提供给动画师,构成外表以下的骨架、内装.

trans.tran_en: the hard parts on the outside of the body of creatures such as insects and crabs
